Key Match Events: Phoenix Suns outscored Portland Trail Blazers 44-18 in the third quarter
Devin Booker hit the free throw line to push the Suns up by six with only seconds remaining on the clock
Portland went on a 24-4 scoring run to draw within eight points with three minutes left
Post-Match Reflections: Phoenix Suns avoided a late collapse to ultimately defeat Portland 103-97
Devin Booker led all scorers with 28 points, nine assists, and nine rebounds
Kevin Durant officially made 10,000 field goal attempts
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kevin Durant led all scorers with 14 points in the first half
Deandre Ayton struggled from the field with 2-10 shooting halfway through the third
The Suns made just 12 field goals in the first half
